# ALTER TABLE

`ALTER TABLE` changes the parameters of a table.

## Syntax

<div class="rr-diagram">

![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)

</div>

<div class="rr-diagram">

![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)

</div>

| Field | Use |
|----|----|
| *name* | The identifier of the table you want to alter. |
| *retention_period* | ***Private preview.** This option has known performance or stability issues and is under active development.* Duration for which Materialize retains historical data, which is useful to implement [durable subscriptions](/docs/transform-data/patterns/durable-subscriptions/#history-retention-period). Accepts positive [interval](/docs/sql/types/interval/) values (e.g. `'1hr'`). Default: `1s`. |

</div>
